title: The search in phone book returns duplicate contacts, but in contacts app there are no duplicates.
content:
In the phone app when I search for contacts the search returns duplicate contacts.




I search the contacts app and there are no duplicates. So my phone book has no duplicates.


I cleared the cache for the phone app and the search returned the same duplicates.

I cleared the storage for the phone app and this resoles my problem. No more duplicates.


But after a few minutes, the search begins to return duplicates again and I have to clear the storage again.

I mention that everything is updated, including the November patch.
In the time I did the screenshots I did not call any of the contacts.
For the contacts I use google account.
